label: Market Competition by Claim
description: Assess competitive intensity by marketing claim, showing number of SKUs and evaluation of white space vs saturation.

defaultOutputs.name: Claim
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Front-of-pack or marketing claim text (e.g. "Anti-hair fall / reduces hair loss", "Promotes hair growth", "Hair growth + scalp barrier repair").

defaultOutputs.name: # SKU in the Market
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Approximate number of SKUs (stock keeping units) in the market carrying this claim. May be exact (e.g. "8") or approximate with "+" suffix (e.g. "150+").

defaultOutputs.name: Evaluation
